faqs.title: What is the “MyNumba Don Win” promo?
faqs.content: The “MyNumba Don Win” promo is a promotional activity that offers subscribers of MTN the chance to win cash prizes just by performing top-up on their account and with no extra cost.

faqs.title: How do I collect points in the promotion?
faqs.content: You collect points just by performing top ups throughout the duration of the promotion.

faqs.title: Is there a cost for participating to the promotion?
faqs.content: No new added cost, you only need to opt-in to the promo event and continue to recharge your mobile phone as you normally do, there is no extra cost for participating in the promotion.

faqs.title: How many times can I top up?
faqs.content: You can top up as many times as you want. The more times you top up, the more points you earn for the draws.
